briefTitle: A Placebo- and Ropinirole-Controlled Study for SPM 962 in Advanced Parkinson's Disease Patients
officialTitle: A Double-Blind, 3-Arm, Parallel Group, Placebo- and Ropinirole-Controlled Study for SPM 962 in Advanced Parkinson's Disease Patients With Concomitant Treatment of L-dopa
summary:
* To demonstrate the non-inferiority of SPM 962 to ropinirole in terms of efficacy in order to confirm clinical value of SPM 962.
* To demonstrate the superiority of SPM 962 to placebo in terms of efficacy.
* To investigate the tolerability and safety of SPM 962 up to 36.0 mg/day.

primaryOutcome.measure: Unified Parkinson's Disease Rating Score (UPDRS) Part 3 Sum Score
